plugins.name: orchestrator-guide
plugins.description: Multi-agent orchestration framework for complex tasks with 5-element delegation protocol. Use /orchestrator for task coordination, /planner for spec generation, /delegator for delegation prompts.

plugins.name: project-context-store
plugins.description: 코드 재현에 필요한 컨텍스트를 CLAUDE.md로 자동 문서화. /context-generate로 생성, /context-update로 업데이트, /context-validate로 검증.
